name: react-native-nitro-crypto
description: Node.js crypto implementation for React Native using Nitro Modules and Rust

scripts.copy-clib: rm -rf ios/Frameworks/RNCrypto.xcframework && mkdir -p ios/Frameworks && cp -R ../rust_c_crypto/target/xcframework/RNCrypto.xcframework ios/Frameworks/ && mkdir -p android/libs/arm64-v8a android/libs/armeabi-v7a android/libs/x86 android/libs/x86_64 && cp ../rust_c_crypto/target/aarch64-linux-android/release/librn_node_crypto.so android/libs/arm64-v8a/ && cp ../rust_c_crypto/target/armv7-linux-androideabi/release/librn_node_crypto.so android/libs/armeabi-v7a/ && cp ../rust_c_crypto/target/i686-linux-android/release/librn_node_crypto.so android/libs/x86/ && cp ../rust_c_crypto/target/x86_64-linux-android/release/librn_node_crypto.so android/libs/x86_64/

author: iwater <iwater@gmail.com>
